cast.overview: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.
cast.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves

cast.overview: When a shadowy CIA agent uncovers damning agency secrets, he's hunted across the globe by a sociopathic rogue operative who's put a bounty on his head.
cast.title: The Gray Man

cast.original_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
cast.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort's bid for immortality. But with Harry's beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort's unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.
cast.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

details.biography:
Regé-Jean Page (/ˌrɛɡeɪ ˈʒɒ̃ ˈpeɪdʒ/) is a British actor known for his role in the first series of Netflix's period drama Bridgerton in 2020. He has also appeared in the series Waterloo Road (2015) on BBC One, Roots (2016) on History, and For the People (2018–2019) on ABC, and has since had roles in the action film The Gray Man (2022) and the fantasy film Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves (2023).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Regé-Jean Page, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Regé-Jean Page
